thread.title: South Africa based Edwin Gyimah delighted as Pirates return to winning ways
thread.title_full: South Africa based Edwin Gyimah delighted as Pirates return to winning ways

title: South Africa based Edwin Gyimah delighted as Pirates return to winning ways
text:
11:25 CET South Africa based Edwin Gyimah delighted as Pirates return to winning ways - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and Orlando Pirates defender Edwin Gyimah 
Ghana and Orlando Pirates defender Edwin Gyimah says he is glad his side has returned to winning ways in the league after a 2-0 win over Maritzburg United. 
A 24 th minute strike from Kent Erasmus gave Pirates the lead earlier on before South Africa international Mpho Makola stamped the victory on the 47 th minute. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
